definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Job 31:38 furrow;—abs. ´[[ת]]: Job 39:10 (other conj. Du Perles:Anal. 53); pl. cstr. [[תַּלְמֵי שָׂדָָי]] Ho 10:4, Ho 12:12; sf. [[תְּלָמֶיהָ]] Job 31:38 Ps 65:11.—On ploughing in Pal. v. Hogg:Ency. Bib. AGRICULTURE Vogelstein:Landwirthsch. 25 ff., on depth of furrow (not more than 8–10 centim.) Id:ib.36 Anderlind:ZPV ix. 25, 29; also Benz Arch.s.v.—[[תִּלָּם]] v. [[תֵּל]] supr.
